pullRequest.title: Fix missing dependencies due to Aggregation through Join pushdown

commit.message:
Fix mask matching in AggregationMatcher

    - identify aggregations with mask by `getMask().isPresent()` instead of
    checking if the aggregation is distinct. (DISTINCT aggregations might be
    rewritten to use mask in certain cases; the presence of mask might also
    result from FILTER)
    - pass String instead of Symbol to AggregationMatcher

    Also, remove the old `masks` parameter from `PlanMatchPattern.aggregation()`
    methods. It was never actually used.

    Note: only sets of expected and actual mask symbols are compared.
    Note2: AggregationMatcher constructors should be rewritten to use builder.

commit.message:
Fix aggregation symbols mapping

In PushAggregationThroughOuterJoin rule, source symbols of
AggregationNode were replaced but only aggregation function arguments
were remapped accordingly. Other aggregation symbols in mask, filter
and order by were not mapped and so the resulting plan might have had
broken dependencies.

Cast null to expected type

In PushAggregationThroughOuterJoin rule, a ValuesNode with single row of
nulls is created. After this change, null literals are cast to expected types.
Not casting them didn't cause issues because type was never required or checked
when processing a null value.

afterCommit.message:
Cast null to expected type

In PushAggregationThroughOuterJoin rule, a ValuesNode with single row of
nulls is created. After this change, null literals are cast to expected types.
Not casting them didn't cause issues because type was never required or checked
when processing a null value.
